e: Voglio parlare italiano

I want to speak Italian with you now.

I want to speak with you now

I want to speak now

I'm trying to speak

I'm trying to speak Italian
Sto tentando di parlare con te
I'm trying to speak with you
Sto tentando di imparare.
I'm trying to learn.

I want to learn Italian

How to speak Italian
